Question: In 1961, Sutcliffe left the band and this person reluctantly became their bass player.
Hints: This person also played lead guitar on "Another Girl".
This person took up painting in 1983, and he first exhibited his work in Siegen, Germany, in 1999.
Considered a high point in the Beatles catalogue, both Lennon and this person claimed lead authorship for the song, "In My Life".
